member.name: RGBTRIPLE
member.summary: The RGBTRIPLE structure describes a color consisting of relative intensities of red, green, and blue. The bmciColors member of the structure consists of an array of RGBTRIPLE structures.

member.name: RGBTRIPLE.rgbtBlue
member.summary: The intensity of blue in the color.

member.name: RGBTRIPLE.rgbtGreen
member.summary: The intensity of green in the color.

member.name: RGBTRIPLE.rgbtRed
member.summary: The intensity of red in the color.
